gemini.instruction: Analyze the test suite for MagicMock usage patterns. For each test file: 1) Count MagicMock instances, 2) Identify which simulation classes are mocked (Household, Firm, Bank, etc.), 3) Rate migration difficulty (EASY/MEDIUM/HARD) based on mock complexity. Output a prioritized migration plan for converting tests to Golden Fixture-based mocks. Flag any tests with Bank dependencies that may need special handling after WO-081 refactor.

jules.title: WO-083B: Test Migration Phase 1
jules.instruction: Great work. Proceed with the submission. Make sure to double-check that no regressions were introduced in the verification scripts.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check behavior logic and test coverage.
